popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Find MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage all your web3 things for one place!

news.title: Way to sell crypto collect cash with MetaMask
news.subtitle: MetaMask Portfolio get this Sell thing wey dey allow you sell your crypto and get money from people wey MetaMask don check well well, with just small clicks.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio get this Sell thing wey allow you to change your crypto to regular money (like Dollar, Euro, and Pound) with no stress. Combined with di Buy function, e fit make you be your own boss for web3 experience with less middlemen and quick conversion to normal money straight to where you wan am, like your bank account or PayPal balance if e dey available


Crypto sellers wey dem approve


Instead to limit to one provider, MetaMask gather many providers wey dey trusted (many of dem dey de same ones for de [Buy] (http://portfolio.metamask.io/buy?utm_source=metamask&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=feature-articles_content) flow)—make sure dem meet our high standards—to show you different options wey dey available in real-time to change your ETH on Ethereum Mainnet to de normal money wey you choose (where dem dey available).

People from all over de world


You fit sell things now for the US (but some states get their own rules), UK, and some places for Europe, but dem get plan to extend am to more places to help our people all over di world. Na important thing for people to fit freely buy and sell crypto, and we hope say these ways go make web3 reach plenty more people. We dey start with support for ETH for Ethereum Mainnet, but soon, we go fit get even more kain kain tokens wey them dey use for gas for those levels wey dey on top of the main network (layer 2), and even normal money like US Dollar (USD), Euro (EUR), and British Pound (GBP).

How to use di Sell Crypto feature for MetaMask Portfolio:


To sell ya crypto for money:

  1. Connect ya MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Press di “Sell” tab to start am
  3. Pick ya area
  4. Pick di crypto and network wey you wan sell from (For example: ETH for Ethereum network)
  5. Pick the account wey you wan make your money enter for your area (for example: bank account or PayPal account wey you get money for inside)
  6. Put the amount of crypto wey you wan sell (example: 0.5 ETH)
  7. All the prices from all the different people wey dey sell go show right now. Pick one make you kontinu.
  8. Dem go send you safely go the website of the person wey dey sell to register and connect your regular money account, then send you back go MetaMask Portfolio.
  9. Pick "Send ETH to [Provider]" to move your crypto from your wallet to your bank account.
  10. Confam di transaction for ya MetaMask wallet.
  11. You go fit monitor your order as e dey process for di "Sell" place. Each person wey dey sell get their own time, and your money fit take some days to show for your normal bank account.

Success! 🦊

E dey aligned with oga/madam wey dey sell am


With the Buy and Sell ting for your MetaMask Portfolio, you fit buy and sell your crypto and cash with many of the same people wey you don know already. E mean say you go only need to sign-up and connect your bank account one time with one particular oga/madam wey dey sell. We hope say you go like to dey use dis features.

Shey you don dey ready to enter? Sabi plenti for metamask.io/portfolio/.

MetaMask Portfolio: Carry eye see and watch over all your web3 kain kain things

MetaMask Portfolio na ogbonge platform wey dey easy to use and get all your web3 things for one place, e go help you control everything yourself. Through Dashboard, Buy, Swap, Bridge, Stake, you dey safe. We dey always work hard to make the dapp better and better with updates wey go make sense. Press here to sabi more about MetaMask Portfolio and wetin e fit do.

news.metaTitle: Way to Sell Crypto Collect Cash with MetaMask
news.metaDescription: Sabi how you fit sell crypto for real money with MetaMask, and easily change your crypto to real money with trusted people wey dem check well well.

nodes.title: 3 Ways the Wallet Guard Integration Makes MetaMask More Secure
nodes.subtitle: Learn how MetaMask enhances security by integrating Wallet Guard to protect users from scams and hacks as the web3 ecosystem grows, offering stronger security and increased user confidence.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
According to the 2024 Crime Report by Chainalysis, over $1.7 billion worth of crypto was stolen from users through scams in 2023 alone. This follows $3.7 billion in 2022 and over $3 billion in 2021. The permissionless nature of web3 makes securing users in real-time complex, as a result, hacks and scams are still a big problem and as the industry continues to grow, these scams pose a serious threat to both existing users and those new to the space.

Recently acquired by Consensys, Wallet Guard is a user-centric security platform featuring a browser extension, security dashboard, and MetaMask Snap that keeps users’ wallets, digital assets, and data safe from theft, scams, and fraud. This acquisition is a key part of MetaMask’s ongoing commitment to protecting our users against ever-evolving threats and building a secure ecosystem ready to welcome the next generation of web3 users.

Since the acquisition, the Wallet Guard team has integrated with the MetaMask team, bringing their wealth of experience in building robust security solutions. Together, they’re adding new layers of protection to MetaMask, making it much harder for scammers and hackers to target MetaMask customers and helping to prevent hacks and scams before they even happen.

Here are three ways this integration will make MetaMask even more secure for our users:

1. Enhanced security through core technology integration

The integration of Wallet Guard’s core technology directly into MetaMask will significantly elevate the wallet's security standards offering an additional layer of security to users when interacting with dapps and smart contracts across the web3 ecosystem. It will also complement and enhance existing security measures by continuing to leverage third-party security providers like Blockaid. MetaMask is aggregating the best services into one solution to protect its end users.

2. Comprehensive protection throughout the user lifecycle

With the Wallet Guard team’s extensive expertise now part of MetaMask, security enhancements will extend beyond just dapp interactions. This means that every aspect of the user’s journey within MetaMask—from key management to asset protection—will be strengthened. Whether a user is creating a new wallet, storing private keys, or managing digital assets, MetaMask’s advanced security protocols will protect against potential threats. This approach reduces risks and provides a more secure environment for all web3 activities.

3. More confidence for users and faster responses to threats

By integrating Wallet Guard, MetaMask will enhance its ability to provide users with real-time security insights, offering clearer visibility into the safety of their transactions. With Wallet Guard’s proven expertise in detecting and blocking malicious activities, MetaMask users can have greater confidence in managing their transactions. Additionally, Wallet Guard’s threat detection capabilities enable MetaMask to identify and address vulnerabilities more quickly, helping to notify users and provide them with remedial actions.

Looking ahead

MetaMask is putting security first and taking it up a notch by acquiring Wallet Guard. Over the next few months, you can expect significant security enhancements as MetaMask sets new standards for wallet security across the entire ecosystem. Stronger security in wallets will not only help expand the ecosystem but also keep users engaged by making it easier and safer to interact with the permissionless environment. Keep your customers protected by encouraging them to use MetaMask, the most secure wallet available.

nodes.metaTitle: 3 Ways the Wallet Guard Integration Makes MetaMask Secure
nodes.metaDescription: Learn how MetaMask enhances security by integrating Wallet Guard to protect users from scams and hacks.

nodes.title: How to Send and Swap Crypto at the Same Time
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask’s “Send and Swap” feature streamlines sending any crypto from your existing tokens in one click. No additional swapping step needed.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Now, when you send crypto from your wallet, you can choose whatever token you want to spend from and choose the token the other person wants to receive. MetaMask is streamlining payments by enabling swaps within the send transaction flow.

Owe your friend DAI but only have ETH? Instead of swapping in a separate DEX and coming back to your account to handle it, you can spend your existing crypto, choose the token and amount your friend wants to receive, and confirm the approval.

This update is available on all swap-supported networks on MetaMask Extension, with Mobile and Portfolio coming soon.

Eliminate multiple steps with one approval

Our assets become more pragmatic when friends, family, and businesses choose to accept crypto. Want to use your airdrop to split the bill with friends? Put those niche memecoins to use by funding another account with ETH? Tip your conference barista in stablecoins with a QR code?

We hope this update makes using crypto more convenient and flexible. You can show your non-web3 friends and family the ropes and how to get started.

Why send crypto over cash?

Good point, if you haven’t used the “Send” feature in a while, here are some everyday use cases. But TL;DR: crypto enables micro-transfers, instant settlement, and is borderless.

  • Splitting bills: Whether you're out for dinner with friends or sharing household expenses with roommates, using crypto allows you to settle bills, even across different currencies if your friends are international.
  • Gifting crypto: Ever consider sending birthday crypto or inaugurating a friend’s first crypto account?
  • Transferring funds between accounts: Sometimes you just gotta move tokens around your accounts.
  • Buying or selling goods and services: Depending on who accepts it, you can enable microtransactions
  • Tipping or donating: Crypto means you can tip service providers (like the ETHDenver baristas) and contribute to charities in the token of their choice without geographical limitations.

How to use MetaMask’s “Send and Swap” feature

  1. Open your MetaMask wallet and select “Send” within the actions bar
  2. Enter the address you want to send crypto to
  3. Choose the token and enter the amount you want to send from your account (example: ETH)
  4. Choose the token the account will receive (example: your friend Gimli only wants/accepts DAI)
  5. Review quote and confirm transaction

Sent. 🦊

nodes.metaTitle: How to Send and Swap Crypto at the Same Time
nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask’s “Send and Swap” feature streamlines sending any crypto from your existing tokens in one click. No additional swapping step needed.

nodes.title: Introducing MetaMask Card:  Upgrade Your Crypto Spending
nodes.subtitle: With MetaMask Card, users can now spend their crypto anywhere Mastercard is accepted. This pilot is available to a limited group of users in the EU and UK only.

image.title: Introducing MetaMask Card:  Upgrade Your Crypto Spending Image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
In an exciting development for crypto natives and everyday consumers alike, MetaMask, Mastercard, and Baanx (Crypto Life) have launched the pilot of MetaMask Card - the world's first Mastercard payment card that enables direct spending from your MetaMask wallet. Eligible users can now make everyday purchases with their crypto anywhere Mastercard is accepted.

“MetaMask Card pilot gives people more freedom to spend their crypto,” says Lorenzo Santos, Senior Product Manager at Consensys. “MetaMask Card represents a major step to removing the friction that has traditionally existed between the blockchain and real-world commerce. This is a paradigm shift that offers the best of both worlds.”

In line with this, Chief Commercial Officer at Baanx, Simon Jones says, “We are so delighted to partner with web3’s leading wallet, MetaMask, to power the financial revolution by enabling users to be their own bank.”

This pilot is available to a limited group of users in the EU and UK only. To find out if you're eligible, simply go to your MetaMask Portfolio and check if you have a "Card" tab in the navigation bar on the left side. Eligible users with the Card tab will be redirected to the Crypto Life platform to set up their account and card.

Accelerating Crypto Adoption by Removing Barriers to Spending

For too long, the process of spending crypto in the real world has been cumbersome and often requires jumping through several hoops like sending funds to an exchange, transferring it to a bank, and only then being able to spend. This tedious user journey has hindered mainstream adoption of crypto as a practical, real-world currency.

MetaMask Card upgrades this experience by eliminating the need for a bank to spend your crypto. This not only paves the way for increased adoption, it also aligns with the MetaMask vision of empowering people with self-custody.

Most traditional crypto cards operate similarly to prepaid cards, where one must transfer funds to a third party before spending them.

What makes the MetaMask Card unique is that it functions like a debit card. This means card holders can directly use the crypto in their MetaMask wallet for everyday purchases and maintain control over their funds until the exact moment of payment. MetaMask Card utilizes Mastercard's global merchant network, combined with the security of MetaMask and the efficiency of Linea secured by the Ethereum network. This trio brings a swift, cost-effective, and secure spending experience, whether online or for in store purchases.

A Phased Launch to Global Expansion of the MetaMask Card

The pilot phase is kicking off in the EU and the UK, offering a few thousand users the chance to sign up for a MetaMask Card, which includes integration with Apple Pay or Google Pay for immediate use. Eligible currencies at launch include USDC, USDT, and WETH on Linea.

Go to MetaMask Portfolio and check for the "Card" tab to see if you’re eligible. If you are, check out Getting Started with MetaMask Card for easy instructions on how to set up and use your card.

If you are not eligible during the pilot phase, but would like to be notified when you might be in the future, fill out this form.

Looking ahead, MetaMask Card is set to expand its reach, with plans for geographic expansion into additional regions. Stay tuned for more updates on MetaMask Card.

nodes.metaTitle: Introducing MetaMask Card:  Upgrade Your Crypto Spending
